meta.name: The Simpsons
meta.description: The Simpsons is the longest running scripted show in US television history. It captures the adventures of Homer, Marge, Maggie, Bart and Lisa who are living in a fictional town called Springfield.

videos.title: Parahormonal Activity
videos.overview: Set in the near future, Marge is competently coping with the hormonal onslaught hitting her now teenage kids when she's suddenly struck by a big life change of her own, leaving Homer as the last sane person in the house.. or is he?

videos.title: Guess Who's Coming to Skinner
videos.overview: When Principal Skinner discovers that one of his students is a runaway who has been living in the school library, he has to take the snarky, difficult kid into his home and is forced into a role he never expected or wanted - being a parent.

videos.title: Simpsons Roasting on an Open Fire
videos.overview: Homer's Christmas bonus is canceled and the rainy-day funds are needed to pay for Bart's tattoo removal in the first full-length episode of the subversive animated satire about Springfield's hapless first family.

videos.title: Bart the Genius
videos.overview: Bart is moved to a school for the gifted after he switches aptitude tests with another boy.

videos.title: Homer's Odyssey
videos.overview: After being fired from the nuclear power plant for negligence, Homer becomes a safety activist.

videos.title: There's No Disgrace Like Home
videos.overview: After seeing families being nice to each other at a company picnic, Homer orders the Simpsons to a family therapist.

videos.title: Bart the General
videos.overview: Terrorized by the school bully, Bart seeks counsel from Grandpa Simpson, who takes him to a warfare expert for basic training.

videos.title: Moaning Lisa
videos.overview: The meaning of life and second grade have Lisa playing the blues solo---until she jams with a kindred spirit; Homer seeks tutelage to beat Bart at video boxing.

videos.title: The Call of the Simpsons
videos.overview: The Simpsons put the wild back in the wilderness when their RV goes over a cliff and Homer and Bart go for help, get lost and lose their clothes.

videos.title: The Telltale Head
videos.overview: Bart pulls a stunt that shocks the entire town, including the new friends he was trying to impress.

videos.title: Life on the Fast Lane
videos.overview: Homer's bowling-ball gift "for Marge" prompts her to take up the sport---and maybe also a handsome instructor who offers to teach her "many things."

videos.title: Homer's Night Out
videos.overview: Shutterbug Bart captures Homer with a sexy entertainer at a bachelor party.

videos.title: The Crepes of Wrath
videos.overview: A little story about how Bart saves France after blowing up Principal Skinner's mom with a cherry bomb. A Albanian child comes to stay with the Simpsons in his place and becomes Homers tag along buddy.

videos.title: Krusty Gets Busted
videos.overview: Bart's TV hero Krusty the Clown is arrested for a convenience-store robbery, and witness Homer must testify against the clown.

videos.title: Some Enchanted Evening
videos.overview: Homer takes Marge out for a romantic night, leaving the kids with a sitter---who's profiled on "America's Most Armed and Dangerous."

videos.title: Bart Gets an F
videos.overview: In exchange for study tips, Bart gives the class brain anti-geek lessons, but regrets it when the brain becomes too Bart-like. Blackboard: 'I will not encourage others to fly'.

videos.title: Simpson and Delilah
videos.overview: Homer lies on a medical insurance form in order to obtain a miracle hair restoring drug. Blackboard: 'Tar is not a plaything.'

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror
videos.overview: Halloween tales include a family in a haunted house; a misunderstanding with aliens; and a rendition of "The Raven."

videos.title: Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish
videos.overview: Homer's boss, Burns, wants to be governor to lower nuclear-safety standards to keep his plant on line. Blackboard 'I will not Xerox my Butt'.

videos.title: Dancin' Homer
videos.overview: Homer's success as the mascot of Springfield's minor-league ball club earns him a shot at the majors, in Capital City.

videos.title: Dead Putting Society
videos.overview: Lisa gives Bart some tips on handling the pressure in a miniature-golf grudge match with a neighbor's son.

videos.title: Bart vs. Thanksgiving
videos.overview: On Thanksgiving, Bart runs away after accidentally wrecking Lisa's centerpiece.

videos.title: Bart the Daredevil
videos.overview: After seeing a daredevil at a truck rally, Bart discovers his reason for living---a career in death defiance.

videos.title: Itchy & Scratchy & Marge
videos.overview: Marge's protests over cartoon violence lead to a cultural renaissance in Springfield.

videos.title: Bart Gets Hit by a Car
videos.overview: A lawyer suggests there may be profit in the pain after Bart suffers minor injuries in a collision with Burns' car.

videos.title: One Fish, Two Fish, Blowfish, Blue Fish
videos.overview: Homer takes to sushi like a fish to water, but an apprentice chef may have given Homer some bad blowfish---and 24 hours to live.

videos.title: The Way We Was
videos.overview: Marge and Homer reveal how they met as they tell a tale of love at first sight (but only for one) and the high-school prom they attended (but not together).

videos.title: Homer vs. Lisa and the Eighth Commandment
videos.overview: After learning eternal hell is the price for stealing, Lisa decides she'd rather go to heaven than watch pirated cable.

videos.title: Principal Charming
videos.overview: Bart benefits when Principal Skinner falls for his Aunt Patty, who has Skinner but doesn't want him, while Aunt Selma has naught but want.

videos.title: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
videos.overview: Danny DeVito is the voice of Homer's wealthy long-lost half brother, who makes the mistake of giving Homer an important job.

videos.title: Bart's Dog Gets an F
videos.overview: Bart's dog is sent to obedience school after he destroys Homer's expensive new sneaks.

videos.title: Old Money
videos.overview: Grandpa Simpson loses his love, leaving him with a heavy heart---and a heavy wallet when his sweetie leaves him money in her will.

videos.title: Brush with Greatness
videos.overview: Ringo Starr has a cartoon cameo as Marge gets to paint a portrait of Mr. Burns.

videos.title: Lisa's Substitute
videos.overview: Lisa finds that Homer pales in comparison with her substitute teacher, as does Bart with his opponent for class president.

videos.title: The War of the Simpsons
videos.overview: Homer and Marge attend a marriage retreat, where Homer catches a legendary fish---and maybe more.

videos.title: Three Men and a Comic Book
videos.overview: Bart earns less than he expected doing chores for a neighbor, so he goes partners with Milhouse and Martin on a rare comic book.

videos.title: Blood Feud
videos.overview: After Bart's blood saves Burns, Homer sends his boss a nasty letter for falling short of the material gratitude that Homer expected.

videos.title: Stark Raving Dad
videos.overview: A deviation from his norm lands Homer in a mental institution, where he shares a room with a man who thinks he's Michael Jackson.

videos.title: Mr. Lisa Goes to Washington
videos.overview: Lisa's essay wins the Simpsons a trip to Washington, D.C., where her faith in democracy is shaken by her unethical Congressman.

videos.title: When Flanders Failed
videos.overview: Flanders suffers a failure after Homer wishes him ill.

videos.title: Bart the Murderer
videos.overview: While working for Fat Tony (Joe Mantegna), Bart gains enough influence with his boss to solve his problems with Principal Skinner---perhaps permanently.

videos.title: Homer Defined
videos.overview: Homer's averting of a nuclear meltdown earns him employee-of-the-month honors---and a call from Magic Johnson; Milhouse's parents prohibit him from playing with Bart.

videos.title: Like Father Like Clown
videos.overview: Bart and Lisa use theological arguments to try to reunite Krusty the Clown and his rabbi father, who disowned Krusty when he turned from rabbi to clown.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror II
videos.overview: Maggie uses one of three wishes; a mind-reading Bart rules Springfield; Homer donates his brain to Mr. Burns' science project.

videos.title: Lisa's Pony
videos.overview: After disappointing Lisa, Homer buys her a pony, solving one problem, but creating others, requiring a second job---at Apu's Quik-e-Mart.

videos.title: Saturdays of Thunder
videos.overview: When Homer helps Bart build a soapbox racer, it does little for the car but a lot for their relationship. Meanwhile, Patty and Selma get a hair makeover.

videos.title: Flaming Moe's
videos.overview: Homer's new drink makes Moe's hot enough to draw Aerosmith, who perform "Walk This Way." Meanwhile, Lisa has invited her friends over for a slumber party which causes problems for Bart.

videos.title: Burns Verkaufen der Kraftwerk
videos.overview: Burns sells the power plant to a German corporation that doesn't care for Homer's approach to his work.

videos.title: I Married Marge
videos.overview: A trip down memory lane to the early days of Simpson wedded bliss, when Marge was with child and Homer was without a job.

videos.title: Radio Bart
videos.overview: Bart fools the town into thinking there's a little boy trapped in a well. Sting performs "We're Sending Our Love down the Well."

videos.title: Lisa the Greek
videos.overview: From 1992: Lisa's ability to pick winning football teams kicks off a strong bond with Homer---which might end with the upcoming Super Bowl.

videos.title: Homer Alone
videos.overview: A stressed Marge vacations alone, leaving Bart and Lisa with Patty and Selma, and Maggie with Homer---until she leaves in search of Marge.

videos.title: Bart the Lover
videos.overview: Bart's answer to detention from Mrs. Krabappel is to answer her personal ad with letters from a Mr. Wonderful, but his last laugh is more of a guilty whimper. Meanwhile, Homer makes a bet with Flanders that if he tries to stop swearing, Flanders will shave off his mustache.

videos.title: Homer at the Bat
videos.overview: Burns hires Major League ringers for the plant softball championship.

videos.title: Separate Vocations
videos.overview: The results from their aptitude tests cause Bart and Lisa to make 180-degree turns in their behavior.

videos.title: Dog of Death
videos.overview: Santa's Little Helper notices resentment after the Simpsons make sacrifices to fund his life-saving operation.

videos.title: Colonel Homer
videos.overview: Marge fears a cheatin' heart when a waitress-country singer asks Homer to be her manager.

videos.title: Black Widower
videos.overview: Bart suspects something rotten when Selma gets engaged to Sideshow Bob.

videos.title: The Otto Show
videos.overview: Spinal Tap hits Springfield, and Otto the bus driver hits the skids after being fired, taking refuge in the Simpsons' garage.

videos.title: Bart's Friend Falls in Love
videos.overview: Bart resents Milhouse's new girlfriend; Homer gets the wrong subliminal tape, which has him gaining vocabulary, not losing weight.

videos.title: Brother, Can You Spare Two Dimes?
videos.overview: Homer's stepbrother asks for a loan after Homer is awarded some cash, presented by Smokin' Joe Frazier.

videos.title: Kamp Krusty
videos.overview: Bart leads an uprising at Krusty's summer camp after he and Lisa are subjected to a Dickensian sweatshop.

videos.title: A Streetcar Named Marge
videos.overview: Marge is cast in a version of "A Streetcar Named Desire," playing Blanche to Ned Flanders' Stanley.

videos.title: Homer the Heretic
videos.overview: Homer decides to skip church permanently, and God gives His OK in Homer's dream.

videos.title: Lisa the Beauty Queen
videos.overview: Lisa meets Bob Hope when she becomes Little Miss Springfield, a title she inherits after the winner's struck by lightning.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror III
videos.overview: A Halloween trilogy includes a murderous Krusty doll; a "King Kong" parody; an invasion of zombies unleashed by Bart's incantation.

videos.title: Itchy & Scratchy: The Movie
videos.overview: Bart is punished by being barred from the Itchy and Scratchy movie.

videos.title: Marge Gets a Job
videos.overview: Burns tries to please a new employee---Marge---with singer Tom Jones. Meanwhile, Bart cries "wolf" too often.

videos.title: The New Kid on the Block
videos.overview: A new neighbor captures---and breaks---Bart's heart; Homer sues after a restaurant denies him "all you can eat."

videos.title: Mr. Plow
videos.overview: Homer and Barney become competitors in the snow-plowing business.

videos.title: Lisa's First Word
videos.overview: Maggie speaks, but not before the story of Lisa's first word is recalled, as well as how the 1984 Soviet Olympic boycott hurt Krusty.

videos.title: Homer's Triple Bypass
videos.overview: The stresses of life and his eating habits catch up and Homer sees a discount doctor for a coronary bypass.

videos.title: Marge vs. the Monorail
videos.overview: Leonard Nimoy is among the first to ride Springfield's new monorail, opposed by Marge.

videos.title: Selma's Choice
videos.overview: A relative passes away and the Simpson clan goes to the Funeral. After Selma receives a videotaped warning about dying alone, she wants a baby.

videos.title: Brother from the Same Planet
videos.overview: Homer's neglect sends Bart looking for a new father; Lisa battles addiction to a "Springfield Heights, 90210" star.

videos.title: I Love Lisa
videos.overview: Chief Wiggum's son has a crush on Lisa after she gives him a Valentine out of pity.

videos.title: Duffless
videos.overview: Homer goes on the wagon after a drunken-driving arrest; Lisa's science project pits Bart's brain against a hamster's.

videos.title: Last Exit to Springfield
videos.overview: Union president Homer fights to keep the dental plan.

videos.title: So It's Come to This: A Simpsons Clip Show
videos.overview: Bart's prank hospitalizes Homer, whose life flashes by (in past clips) before he goes into a coma.

videos.title: The Front
videos.overview: Lisa and Bart write an Itchy and Scratchy episode; Homer makes up a missing high-school credit.

videos.title: Whacking Day
videos.overview: Barry White helps Lisa's effort to save snakes from Whacking Day. And, Bart is expelled from Springfield Elementary.

videos.title: Marge in Chains
videos.overview: Lionel Hutz represents Marge after Apu catches her accidentally taking an item from his store.

videos.title: Krusty Gets Kancelled
videos.overview: Johnny Carson, Bette Midler, Luke Perry, Hugh Hefner and the Red Hot Chili Peppers help Krusty when his show is canceled after a new star causes his ratings to plummet.

videos.title: Homer's Barbershop Quartet
videos.overview: Homer recalls when he, Apu, Barney and Principal Skinner became recording icons---after Barney replaced Chief Wiggum, on the advice of their manager. Blackboard: 'I will never win an emmy'.

videos.title: Cape Feare
videos.overview: The Simpsons go incognito to avoid the newly paroled Sideshow Bob, who's out to get Bart. Blackboard: 'The cafeteria deep fryer is not a toy'.

videos.title: Homer Goes to College
videos.overview: Homer takes Nuclear Physics 101 at the local college, where he gets a trio of nerdy tutors expelled for extracurricular activities.

videos.title: Rosebud
videos.overview: Burns longs for a childhood toy that winds up in the grip of Maggie.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror IV
videos.overview: Homer sells his soul; Vampire Burns invites the Simpsons for dinner; Bart sees a gremlin damaging his school bus.

videos.title: Marge on the Lam
videos.overview: Marge's wild night out with neighbor Ruth (Pamela Reed) includes running from the police in Ruth's car, stolen from her ex.

videos.title: Bart's Inner Child
videos.overview: Springfield emulates Bart after he's praised by a self-help guru. James Brown has a cameo at Springfield's Do What You Want festival.

videos.title: Boy-Scoutz 'n the Hood
videos.overview: Bart joins the Junior Campers, which isn't all bad until he goes on a rafting trip that includes Flanders and "celebrity dad" Ernest Borgnine.

videos.title: The Last Temptation of Homer
videos.overview: Homer is attracted to a pretty power-plant worker (voice of Michelle Pfeiffer), and Werner Klemperer speaks for the guardian angel who helps Homer fight temptation. Blackboard: 'All work and no play makes Bart a dull boy.'.

videos.title: $pringfield (or, How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Legalized Gambling)
videos.overview: Legalized gambling comes to Springfield, and Marge becomes addicted; Robert Goulet entertains at Bart's casino for kids. Blackboard: 'I will not say "Springfield" just to get applause'.

videos.title: Homer the Vigilante
videos.overview: Homer leads a vigilante group to catch the Springfield Cat Burglar (voice of Sam Neill), who then robs the museum. Blackboard: 'I am not authorized to fire substitute teachers'.

videos.title: Bart Gets Famous
videos.overview: When an on-air remark catapults Bart to instant stardom, he finds that fame isn't all it's cracked up to be. Blackboard: 'My homework was not stolen by a one-armed man'.

videos.title: Homer and Apu
videos.overview: Homer accompanies Apu to the Kwik-E-Mart home office---in India---after Apu is fired. Blackboard: 'I will not go near the kindergarten turtle'.

videos.title: Lisa vs. Malibu Stacy
videos.overview: Lisa's outrage over the gender stereotypes reinforced by a new talking doll prompts her to confront the dollmaker (Kathleen Turner).

videos.title: Deep Space Homer
videos.overview: Homer and Barney compete to be the first "average" American in space.

videos.title: Homer Loves Flanders
videos.overview: Flanders' extra ticket to the big game makes him Homer's new best friend, a role that sorely tests Flanders' patience. Blackboard: 'I am not delightfully saucy'.

videos.title: Bart Gets an Elephant
videos.overview: Bart wins an elephant, but Homer won't let him keep it. Blackboard: 'Organ transplants are best left to the professionals'.

videos.title: Burns' Heir
videos.overview: Bart is picked to be Burns' heir and moves into the Burns mansion, prompting Homer and Marge to hire a deprogrammer to get him back. Blackboard: 'The pledge of Allegiance does not end with hail satan'.

videos.title: Sweet Seymour Skinner's Baadasssss Song
videos.overview: Bart takes his dog to school, which gets Skinner fired, which in turn leaves Bart missing his archnemesis. Blackboard: 'I will not celebrate meaningless milestones'.

videos.title: The Boy Who Knew Too Much
videos.overview: Bart can clear Mayor Quimby's nephew of a charge of battery, but only by implicating himself as a hooky player. Blackboard: 'There are plenty of businesses like show business'.

videos.title: Lady Bouvier's Lover
videos.overview: Grandpa Simpson falls for Marge's mother, but loses out to a competitor; Bart gets ripped off shopping at home with Homer's credit card.

videos.title: Secrets of a Successful Marriage
videos.overview: Homer teaches a class on "Secrets of a Successful Marriage," but sharing secrets about his own union gets him kicked out of the house. Blackboard: 'Five days is not too long to wait for a gun'.

videos.title: Bart of Darkness
videos.overview: The Simpsons get a pool, but a broken leg sinks the summer for Bart. Blackboard: 'Beans are neither fruit nor musical'.

videos.title: Lisa's Rival
videos.overview: Lisa is dumbfounded by a new classmate who's younger, smarter and her competitor for first-chair sax. Meanwhile, Homer tries to profit after a truck spills its load of sugar.

videos.title: Another Simpsons Clip Show
videos.overview: A family discussion of love yields stories (seen in flashbacks) that all end in heartbreak.

videos.title: Itchy & Scratchy Land
videos.overview: Marge makes Homer promise not to embarrass her when they visit Itchy & Scratchy Land, "the violentest place on earth." Blackboard: 'I am not the reincarnation of Sammy Davis Jr.'.

videos.title: Sideshow Bob Roberts
videos.overview: Mayor Quimby pardons attempted murderer Sideshow Bob (Kelsey Grammer), who then runs against Quimby for mayor.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror V
videos.overview: Frightfest '94: Lack of beer and cable TV make Homer a crazed killer; the present is altered by a time-traveling Homer; and Principal Skinner turns detention students into food.

videos.title: Bart's Girlfriend
videos.overview: Bart learns that the good Rev. Lovejoy's daughter (voice of Meryl Streep) is really bad. Blackboard: 'I will not send lard through the mail'.

videos.title: Lisa on Ice
videos.overview: Lisa's surprising ability at hockey spawns jealousy in Bart and a showdown when their teams meet.

videos.title: Homer Badman
videos.overview: A baby sitter accuses Homer of sexual harassment. Dennis Franz has a voice cameo.

videos.title: Grandpa vs. Sexual Inadequacy
videos.overview: Grandpa's homemade tonic puts life back in the Simpson bedroom, so he and Homer hit the road to sell the stuff. Blackboard: 'My homework was not stolen by a one-armed man'.

videos.title: Fear of Flying
videos.overview: Marge sees a psychiatrist (Anne Bancroft) to explore her fear of flying and learns that her father may be the key. Blackboard: 'Ralph won't "morph" if you squeeze him hard enough'.

videos.title: Homer the Great
videos.overview: Homer becomes the leader of a secret club, but his power is undermined by a "spiritual emptiness." Blackboard: 'Adding "Just kidding" doesn't make it okay to insult the principal'.

videos.title: And Maggie Makes Three
videos.overview: Homer recalls his days as a debt-free dad of two---until Marge got pregnant with Maggie.

videos.title: Bart's Comet
videos.overview: A comet is hurtling toward Springfield, so the Simpsons take refuge in a bomb shelter---Flanders'.

videos.title: Homie the Clown
videos.overview: Homer graduates from Krusty's Clown College and becomes a target for the clown's bookie. Blackboard: 'Next time it could be me on the scaffolding'.

videos.title: Bart vs. Australia
videos.overview: After tricking an Australian boy into accepting a collect call, Bart flies Down Under to apologize. Blackboard: 'I will not hang donuts on my person'.

videos.title: Homer vs. Patty and Selma
videos.overview: A loan from Patty and Selma makes Homer their slave; Bart is forced to take ballet.

videos.title: A Star is Burns
videos.overview: Film critic Jay Sherman (Jon Lovitz) is among the judges at the Springfield Film Festival, which Mr. Burns conspires to win by bribing some judges.

videos.title: Lisa's Wedding
videos.overview: A fortuneteller predicts Lisa's engagement and wedding to a fellow student (Mandy Patinkin) from an upper-crust British family.

videos.title: Two Dozen and One Greyhounds
videos.overview: The Simpson household's overrun with puppies---the offspring of Santa's Little Helper and his new girlfriend from which Mr. Burns would love to make a greyhound-skin tuxedo.

videos.title: The PTA Disbands
videos.overview: Bart helps precipitate a teachers strike, but he rues his handiwork when Marge takes over for Mrs. Krabapple. Blackboard: 'I do not have power of attorney over first graders'.

videos.title: Round Springfield
videos.overview: Bart winds up in the hospital as a result of eating Krusty cereal, and when Lisa comes to visit him, she is reunited with her sax idol, who recounts his big break on "The Tonight Show.".  Blackboard: 'Nerve gas is not a toy'.

videos.title: The Springfield Connection
videos.overview: Marge joins the police force after thwarting a criminal, and Homer thinks he now has a free ride as a cop's spouse. Blackboard: 'I will not mock Mrs. Dumbface'.

videos.title: Lemon of Troy
videos.overview: Springfield boys try to recapture the town's beloved lemon tree after it's stolen.

videos.title: Who Shot Mr. Burns? (1)
videos.overview: Mr. Burns makes many enemies when he steals the oil discovered beneath Springfield Elementary. Blackboard: 'This is not a clue...or is it?'.

videos.title: Who Shot Mr. Burns? (2)
videos.overview: Chief Wiggum conducts an investigation into who shot Mr. Burns in an episode that parodies TV dramas, including "Dallas," "Twin Peaks" and "The Fugitive." Blackboard: 'I will not complain about the solution when I hear it'.

videos.title: Radioactive Man
videos.overview: Bart auditions for the part of Fallout Boy in the movie "Radioactive Man," being filmed in Springfield. Blackboard: 'Bewitched does not support satanism'.

videos.title: Home Sweet Homediddly-Dum-Doodily
videos.overview: Innocent mishaps draw the attention of investigators, who put the Simpson kids in a foster home---the Flanders'. Blackboard: 'No one want's to hear from my armpits'.

videos.title: Bart Sells His Soul
videos.overview: Bart sells his soul to Milhouse for five bucks; Moe goes after the family crowd. Blackboard 'I am not a lean mean spitting machine.'.

videos.title: Lisa the Vegetarian
videos.overview: Vegetarian Lisa ruins Homer's barbecue, but she gets moral support from Apu and his friends, Paul and Linda McCartney.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror VI
videos.overview: Halloween 1996: Homer tumbles into another dimension in a story spun off "The Twilight Zone"; Paul Anka helps combat the "Attack of the 50-Foot Eyesores"; and Groundskeeper Willie appears in a spoof of "A Nightmare on Elm Street."

videos.title: King-Size Homer
videos.overview: Homer purposely gains weight to qualify for disability, disdaining Marge's complaints and the fact that she's losing interest in him physically. Blackboard: 'Indian burns are not our cultural heritage'.

videos.title: Mother Simpson
videos.overview: Homer comes face-to-face with his long-lost mother (voice of Glenn Close)---who reveals why she abandoned him.

videos.title: Sideshow Bob's Last Gleaming
videos.overview: Sideshow Bob (voice of Kelsey Grammer) steals an atomic bomb and demands that Springfield abolish television. Blackboard: 'Wedgies are unhealthy for children and other living things'.

videos.title: The Simpsons 138th Episode Spectacular
videos.overview: Troy McClure hosts a retrospective featuring Simpsons history and trivia, and series "outtakes," including an alternate ending to the "Who Shot Mr. Burns?" episode and a burping contest between Barney and baseball's Wade Boggs.

videos.title: Marge Be Not Proud
videos.overview: Busted for shoplifting, Bart manages to keep the incident quiet---until he returns to the store for the Simpsons' Christmas portrait. And the news is devastating to Marge. Blackboard: 'I will stop talking about the twelve inch pianist'.

videos.title: Team Homer
videos.overview: Homer, Moe, Apu and Otto form a bowling team; Bart's prank leads Springfield Elementary to adopt school uniforms. Blackboard: 'I am not certified to remove asbestos'.

videos.title: Two Bad Neighbors
videos.overview: Homer is irked by his new neighbors, former U.S. President George Bush and Former U.S. First Lady Barbara Bush, especially when Mr. Bush gives Bart a spanking and criticizes Homer's parenting for menacing and ruined to have the outboard motor to damage Former President George Bush's new memoirs that he was working in his autobiography.

videos.title: Scenes from the Class Struggle in Springfield
videos.overview: Marge's new designer suit nets her an invitation to the Springfield Country Club, where she finds it's a stress to dress to impress. Meanwhile, "natural" golfer Homer hits the links with Mr. Burns.

videos.title: Bart the Fink
videos.overview: Bart inadvertently alerts the IRS to tax fraud by Krusty, whose possessions are auctioned off by the Government.

videos.title: Lisa the Iconoclast
videos.overview: Lisa's research on Jebediah Springfield turns up some unknown---and unpopular---facts.

videos.title: Homer the Smithers
videos.overview: Homer succumbs to job stress while subbing for Smithers as Burns' assistant.

videos.title: The Day the Violence Died
videos.overview: Bart wants justice done after learning that the animator (voice of Kirk Douglas) who created Itchy was ripped off. Lionel Hutz takes the animator's case.

videos.title: A Fish Called Selma
videos.overview: Selma dates Troy McClure, whose agent (voice of Jeff Goldblum) reports that being seen in public with a woman is a career boost that could make people forget "that scandal at the aquarium."

videos.title: Bart on the Road
videos.overview: Bart drives Milhouse, Martin and Nelson to Tennessee, thanks to his fake ID and Martin's cash from a stock dividend.

videos.title: 22 Short Films About Springfield
videos.overview: Interconnecting vignettes depict moments in the lives of Springfield residents, including Apu's partying activities; Smithers' allergic reaction to a bee sting; and Dr. Nick's appearance before a medical review board.

videos.title: Raging Abe Simpson and His Grumbling Grandson in "The Curse of the Flying Hellfish"
videos.overview: Mr. Burns tries to kill Grampa Simpson to seize a treasure the two found during World War II as members of the "Flying Hellfish" battalion.

videos.title: Much Apu About Nothing
videos.overview: Marge and Homer support a proposal to deport illegal immigrants from Springfield---until they learn it would affect Apu, who buys fraudulent identification documents from Fat Tony (voice of Joe Mantegna).

videos.title: Homerpalooza
videos.overview: Homer goes on tour with Hullabalooza, a rock concert featuring sideshow acts. His talent: catching a cannonball with his belly.

videos.title: Summer of 4 ft. 2
videos.overview: On vacation, Lisa plays dumb to make friends with the "cool" kids, leaving a jealous Bart all burned up, with Milhouse as his only comrade.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror VII
videos.overview: A Halloween trilogy. This time, Bart meets his "pure evil" Siamese twin; Lisa's science project attacks Bart; aliens Kang and Kodos invade Clinton and Dole's replicas just before the 1996 Presidential election.

videos.title: You Only Move Twice
videos.overview: In an idyllic planned community, Homer works for a new boss who has trouble with the government. Meanwhile, the rest of the family has difficulty dealing with the bucolic burg. Blackboard: 'I did not learn everything I need to know in kindergarten'.

videos.title: The Homer They Fall
videos.overview: Moe turns Homer into a prizefighter, who meets the champ in a bout called by ring announcer Michael Buffer.

videos.title: Burns, Baby Burns
videos.overview: Rodney Dangerfield is the voice of Mr. Burns' illegitimate son, who irritates Burns with his lack of social graces. Homer and Mr. Burn's son hatch a scheme to get Mr. Burns's attention.

videos.title: Bart After Dark
videos.overview: While Marge and Lisa are away, Bart becomes the right-hand man for the owner of a burlesque house.

videos.title: A Milhouse Divided
videos.overview: Milhouse's parents decide to divorce, prompting Homer to take action to prevent a similar fate for himself and Marge.

videos.title: Lisa's Date with Density
videos.overview: Lisa develops a crush on Nelson, and then she tries to change him. Meanwhile, Homer solicits money over the phone using an automatic telephone dialer.

videos.title: Hurricane Neddy
videos.overview: Citizens rebuild the Flanders' hurricane-damaged house. But Ned's guilt about criticizing their work sends him to a mental hospital.

videos.title: El Viaje de Nuestro Jomer (The Mysterious Voyage of Homer)
videos.overview: Chief Wiggum's chili peppers send Homer on a hallucinatory, spiritual journey that makes him question whether Marge is his soulmate.

videos.title: The Springfield Files
videos.overview: Homer's claim of an alien sighting brings FBI agents Scully and Mulder to investigate. Blackboard: 'The truth is not out there'.

videos.title: The Twisted World of Marge Simpson
videos.overview: A smooth talker sells Marge on the pretzel business. But when sales go soft, Homer asks crime boss Fat Tony for help. Blackboard "I am not licensed to do anything".

videos.title: Mountain of Madness
videos.overview: On a company mountain retreat, an avalanche traps hiking partners Homer and Mr. Burns in a cabin.

videos.title: Simpsoncalifragilisticexpiala (Annoyed Grunt) cious
videos.overview: When Marge suffers stress-related hair loss, the Simpsons hire nanny Shary Bobbins, who speaks in song and inspires others to do so. But the Simpsons may prove too much for her. Blackboard: 'I will not hide the teacher's prozac'.

videos.title: The Itchy & Scratchy & Poochie Show
videos.overview: Itchy and Scratchy creator Roger Myers picks Homer to be the voice of a new canine character---who is roundly rejected by the public.

videos.title: Homer's Phobia
videos.overview: Homer's fearful about the potential influence that the Simpsons' new gay friend may have on Bart.

videos.title: Brother from Another Series
videos.overview: Murderous convict Sideshow Bob (Kelsey Grammer) is released to work for his brother Cecil (David Hyde Pierce), whom Bob bested at the Krusty-sidekick audition.

videos.title: My Sister, My Sitter
videos.overview: Lisa's reputation as a first-rate baby sitter is jeopardized when she's put in charge of Bart, who's determined to make things tough.

videos.title: Homer vs. the Eighteenth Amendment
videos.overview: Homer becomes a bootlegger when Springfield decides to enforce a 200-year-old prohibition decree.

videos.title: Grade School Confidential
videos.overview: After witnessing a kiss between Skinner and Mrs. Krabappel, Bart becomes their confidante. But rumors of their passion lead to their being fired---until Skinner reveals a secret.

videos.title: The Canine Mutiny
videos.overview: Bart replaces Santa's Little Helper with a "limited edition" dog he bought with a fraudulent credit card. Blackboard: 'A fire drill does not demand a fire'.

videos.title: The Old Man and Lisa
videos.overview: Penniless from bad investments, Burns asks for help from Lisa, who turns him into a profitable recycler. But then Burns takes things a nasty step further to increase his dividends.

videos.title: In Marge We Trust
videos.overview: Reverend Lovejoy puts Marge in charge of counseling parishioners; Homer finds his likeness is popular in Japan as the symbol for a cleaning product.

videos.title: Homer's Enemy
videos.overview: A new plant employee who's had it tough resents Homer's lack of professionalism and his cushy life. Meanwhile, Bart buys an abandoned factory at an auction for a dollar.

videos.title: The Simpsons Spin-Off Showcase
videos.overview: Three mock spin-offs: "Chief Wiggum, P.I."; "The Love-Matic Grandpa"; and "The Simpson Family Smile-Time Variety Hour," with guest star Tim Conway and a teen stand-in for Lisa.

videos.title: The Secret War of Lisa Simpson
videos.overview: Lisa joins the all-male military school where Bart is sent for discipline. Then comes the hazing.

videos.title: The City of New York vs. Homer Simpson
videos.overview: Homer has to take his family to New York city for a madcap adventure after Barney goes on a bender and leaves Homer's car illegally parked at the World Trade Center.

videos.title: The Principal and the Pauper
videos.overview: Principal Skinner is given a achievement award and in the middle of the ceremony a man who claims to be the real Seymour Skinner shows up.

videos.title: Lisa's Sax
videos.overview: The story of how Lisa got her sax includes Bart's first day at school, his visit to the school psychologist and a heat wave in Springfield.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror VIII
videos.overview: In a Halloween trilogy, nuclear survivor Homer battles mutants; Bart is morphed with a fly; Marge is accused of being a witch in 1649.

videos.title: The Cartridge Family
videos.overview: Homer buys a gun, but after a few mishaps, Marge demands he get rid of it. When he doesn't, she leaves with the kids. Blackboard: 'Everyone is tired of that Richard Gere story'.

videos.title: Bart Star
videos.overview: Homer heckles Flanders out of coaching Pee Wee football---and then takes over, replacing winning QB Nelson with Bart.

videos.title: The Two Mrs. Nahasapeemapetilons
videos.overview: Apu tries to wriggle out of a marriage prearranged by his mother years in the past to a woman that he does not remember.

videos.title: Lisa the Skeptic
videos.overview: While digging at a construction site, Lisa finds bones that everyone thinks are the bones of a angel.

videos.title: Realty Bites
videos.overview: Marge gets a realtor's license and goes to work---for Lionel Hutz, who finds her honesty a dubious asset. Meanwhile, Homer buys a hot rod at a police auction, but the incarcerated former owner protests. Blackboard "There was no Roman God named 'Fartacus' ".

videos.title: Miracle on Evergreen Terrace
videos.overview: After accidentally destroying the Simpsons' Christmas gifts, Bart claims a burglar stole them, and Springfield responds generously to that false news. Blackboard: 'Rudolph's red nose is not alcohol-related'.

videos.title: All Singing, All Dancing
videos.overview: Homer rents Paint Your Wagon with Lee Marvin and Clint Eastwood expecting a Shoot 'Em up western. He is so disappointed about it that Marge and Lisa have to try and cheer him up.

videos.title: Bart Carny
videos.overview: Homer and Bart become carnival workers, and take in two fellow carnies whose crooked game is closed by Chief Wiggum.

videos.title: The Joy of Sect
videos.overview: Homer is talked into joining a cult at the airport. The cult promises to take people to another planet. Marge has to work hard to get through the brainwashing. Blackboard: 'Shooting paintballs is not an art form'.

videos.title: Das Bus
videos.overview: A bus accident strands Bart, Lisa and their classmates on an island; Homer starts a business on the Internet.

videos.title: The Last Temptation of Krusty
videos.overview: Krusty makes a fool of himself at the Springfield Comedy Festival and decides to retire. Once at the retirement ceremony he discovers how to make people laugh.

videos.title: Dumbbell Indemnity
videos.overview: Moe finally finds a woman to date, then has Homer help him with a insurance scam to get more money to spend on her. Blackboard: 'Silly string is not a nasal spray'.

videos.title: Lisa the Simpson
videos.overview: Grandpa says "Simpson genes" are behind Lisa's sudden lack of brain power; Jasper tries to live for the future in the Kwik-E-Mart freezer.

videos.title: This Little Wiggy
videos.overview: Marge orders Bart to play with Ralph Wiggum, an appalling task---until Bart gets hold of Chief Wiggum's master key to the city. Blackboard: 'I was not told to do this'.

videos.title: Simpson Tide
videos.overview: When Homer comes up with a not so bright idea at work involving a donut and the nuclear core, Mr. Burns fires him. He then decides to join the Naval Reserve when Lisa tells him that she would be proud of him if he did. Later a nuclear-sub captain puts naval reservist Homer in command during war games. Blackboard: "My butt does not deserve a website".

videos.title: The Trouble with Trillions
videos.overview: Homer gets in trouble with the IRS for his taxes and has to get proof that Burns has money the government wants for them in return.

videos.title: Girly Edition
videos.overview: Lisa becomes the anchor for a kids news show when Krusty's producers try to spice up his program. Bart takes over the show when he is made co-anchor of the program.

videos.title: Trash of the Titans
videos.overview: Homer becomes head of the Springfield Sanitation department and makes outrageous promises that he can't keep. Homer also disrupts a U2 concert.

videos.title: King of the Hill
videos.overview: Homer gets in shape (no, really!) and climbs a mountain to promote the alleged health-food product that helped him achieve success.

videos.title: Lost Our Lisa
videos.overview: Lisa tricks Homer into giving her permission to take the bus downtown alone---then she gets lost. Blackboard; 'I am not the new Dali Lama'.

videos.title: Natural Born Kissers
videos.overview: Homer and Marge try to find ways to spice up their love life by experimenting with risky locals. Blackboard: 'I was not the inspiration for "Kramer"'.

videos.title: Lard of the Dance
videos.overview: A hip new student makes an impression at Springfield Elementary; Homer drags Bart into grease recycling.

videos.title: The Wizard of Evergreen Terrace
videos.overview: Homer goes through a bought of midlife depression and tries to overcome it with a string of inventions inspire by Thomas Edison.

videos.title: Bart the Mother
videos.overview: After an accident with a gun, Bart becomes the caretaker of the eggs from a birds nest.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror IX
videos.overview: The ninth Halloween show. Included: Homer turns evil after a hair transplant; Bart and Lisa get trapped inside their TV; the alien Kang is revealed as Maggie's father.

videos.title: When You Dish Upon a Star
videos.overview: Homer becomes an assistant to Kim Basinger and Alec Baldwin (and their houseguest, Ron Howard), none of whom are interested in his screenplay. Blackboard: 'Butt-Butt is not my email address'.

videos.title: D'Oh-in' in the Wind
videos.overview: In a quest to discover his middle name, Homer meets some of his mothers old hippie friends. He then starts to live a hippy lifestyle.

videos.title: Lisa Gets an "A"
videos.overview: Lisa gets sick then does not study and ends up buying test answers from Nelson.

videos.title: Homer Simpson in: "Kidney Trouble"
videos.overview: Homer takes the family on a trip and does not stop on the way home so Grandpa Simpson can go to the bathroom. This results in Grandpa needing a kidney transplant and Homer has compatible kidney's with his dad.

videos.title: Mayored to the Mob
videos.overview: Homer becomes the mayor's bodyguard and puts a stop to a crooked operation involving Fat Tony, who vows revenge on the mayor.

videos.title: Viva Ned Flanders
videos.overview: Ned is feeling depressed and Homer talks him into going to Las Vegas. After arriving, they spend a wild night on the town and wake up married to two Las Vegas wives. Blackboard: 'My mom is not dating Jerry Seinfeld'.

videos.title: Wild Barts Can't Be Broken
videos.overview: Wiggum declares a curfew for kids, who are being blamed for school vandalism committed by a drunken Homer and friends. Blackboard: 'Sherri does not "Get Back"'.

videos.title: Sunday, Cruddy Sunday
videos.overview: Homer leads a slew of Springfield denizens to the Super Bowl. Blackboard: 'I will not do the dirty bird'.

videos.title: Homer to the Max
videos.overview: Homer discovers a cool Tv character with his name and then they turn the character into a dummy and Homer becomes mortified. He then changes his name and a lot of things change for him.

videos.title: I'm with Cupid
videos.overview: Apu invites Homer and Marge over to his house for dinner and Manjula finds out that most American men do not work 7 days a week 12 plus hours a day and flips out. Apu then begins a series of daily gifts leading up to Valentines day for Manjula which causes all the other wives in Springfield to get Jealous of the attention she is getting from Apu. This causes the men of Springfield to be in the doghouse with their wives and them to be mad at Apu.

videos.title: Marge Simpson in: "Screaming Yellow Honkers"
videos.overview: Marge gets a new sports utility vehicle and develops a bad case of road rage. She then has to go to driving school. Blackboard: 'Grammar is not a time of waste'.

videos.title: Make Room for Lisa
videos.overview: Homer damages the bill of rights at the museum and gives away Lisa's room to compensate for it. Lisa has to move in with Bart. Marge discover that Maggie's baby monitor is picking up local phone calls. Blackboard: 'I do not have diplomatic immunity'.

videos.title: Maximum Homerdrive
videos.overview: Truck drivers target Homer after he blabs about an industry scam while filling in for a recently deceased driver.

videos.title: Simpsons Bible Stories
videos.overview: The family's biblical dreams include Homer and Marge as Adam and Eve, with Flanders as God; Milhouse as Moses; and Bart as David battling Goliath's son ("this time, it's personal").

videos.title: Mom and Pop Art
videos.overview: Isabella Rossellini plays a gallery owner who sees art in the concrete mess that results from Homer's attempt at building a barbeque. After the piece sells, she arranges a one-man show. Blackboard: 'A trained ape could not teach gym'.

videos.title: The Old Man and the "C" Student
videos.overview: Bart puts on a show that causes Springfield to loose hosting the Olympic Games. For punishment, he is forced to volunteer at Grandpa's retirement home.

videos.title: Monty Can't Buy Me Love
videos.overview: After another billionaire makes a memorable impression on Springfield, Burns asks for Homer's help on a quest for popularity, which eventually takes them both to Scotland.

videos.title: They Saved Lisa's Brain
videos.overview: Lisa is invited to join local members of Mensa, who take a complaint to City Hall---and wind up running it. Blackboard: 'No one wants to hear from my armpits.'.

videos.title: 30 Minutes Over Tokyo
videos.overview: After getting tips on thrifty living, the family takes a vacation to Japan, where they appear on a game show to win plane tickets back home. Blackboard: 'I'm so very tired'.

videos.title: Beyond Blunderdome
videos.overview: Mel Gibson brings the Simpsons to Hollywood so Homer can help "tweak" his new film after Homer's is the sole negative voice at a test screening. First tweak: add action, and lots of it.

videos.title: Brother's Little Helper
videos.overview: A drug for Attention Deficit Disorder makes Bart studious, productive---and paranoid about satellites spying on him. Blackboard 'Pork is not a Verb'.

videos.title: Guess Who's Coming to Criticize Dinner
videos.overview: After crashing a food critic's retirement party for the food, Homer ends up taking the lady's place as food critic. He then has Lisa proofread his column and the power goes to his head. The French chef bakes him a very special eclair because of his bad reviews. Blackboard 'I am not the last Don'.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror X
videos.overview: A Halloween trilogy: Homer causes a Y2K catastrophe; superheroes Lisa and Bart save actress Lucy Lawless; Marge runs Flanders over, and Homer tries to cover it up. Dick Clark and Tom Arnold also appear as themselves.

videos.title: E-I-E-I-(Annoyed Grunt)
videos.overview: Homer thinks dueling is great and because of that, the Simpsons end up having to move to a old farm and Homer grows a highly addictive crop after fertilizing the field with plutonium.

videos.title: Hello Gutter, Hello Fadder
videos.overview: Homer cuts out of work to bowl a perfect game then has trouble staying in the limelight afterwords.

videos.title: Eight Misbehavin
videos.overview: Feeling more stressed than blessed after the birth of their octuplets, Apu and Manjula get child-care help in a deal they come to regret.

videos.title: Take My Wife, Sleaze
videos.overview: Homer wins a motorcycle and starts his own gang. The he gets entangled with a real motorcycle gang and they kidnap Marge. Blackboard "I can't see dead people".

videos.title: Grift of the Magi
videos.overview: Bankrupt Springfield Elementary is taken over by a private outfit whose members' real goal is to mine the kids' minds for toy ideas. Blackboard ' I will not sell my kidney on Ebay.'.

videos.title: Little Big Mom
videos.overview: With Marge laid up by a skiing (lodge) accident, Lisa tries to run the house and plays a trick on Homer and Bart to get them to help clean. Blackboard: 'I will not create art from dung'.

videos.title: Faith Off
videos.overview: After Bart's successful laying on of hands at a revival meeting, a preacher declares Bart has "the power." So the boy pitches his own tent. Blackboard: 'I will stop phoning it in'.

videos.title: The Mansion Family
videos.overview: The Simpsons have to take care of Mr. Burn's mansion while he is at the Mayo Clinic getting a checkup. Homer takes advantage of it. Blackboard 'Class Clown is not a paid position'.

videos.title: Saddlesore Galactica
videos.overview: The band Bachman Turner Overdrive preforms at the State Fair. Bart and Homer rescue a horse from the State fair. Homer then starts racing the horse with Bart as the Jockey. Later, Homer discovers a secret about horse jockeys. Lisa's school band competes in a band contest and the winning school band cheats. Lisa then writes a letter to the President of the USA.

videos.title: Alone Again Natura-Diddily
videos.overview: The Simpsons go on a nature hike and Marge discovers that the bird preserve she loves has been turned into a racetrack. During the race a bad accident happens causing someone to pass away, the Simpsons console a grieving friend.

videos.title: Missionary Impossible
videos.overview: Homer is forced to become a missionary on a remote island after he pledges a large sum of money to a local PBS station.

videos.title: Pygmoelian
videos.overview: Moe wins Duff's "beer-tending" contest but loses out on making their calendar. So he undergoes plastic surgery and lands a soap-opera role that he missed years before.

videos.title: Bart to the Future
videos.overview: Bart attempts to sneak into an Indian casino by replacing the ventriloquist dummy and the head of the casino shows him the future when Lisa is President of the United States.

videos.title: Days of Wine and D'Ohses
videos.overview: Barney quits drinking to take helicopter-flying lessons, leaving Homer feeling resentful and inferior; Lisa and Bart enter a contest to photograph the cover of the Springfield phone book.

videos.title: Kill the Alligator and Run
videos.overview: In Florida, Homer gets caught up in spring break partying and accidentally runs over "Captain Jack" a iconic swamp alligator and the family has to go on the lam. Blackboard: "I am not here on a fartball scholarship".

videos.title: Last Tap Dance in Springfield
videos.overview: Bart and Milhouse camp out in a shopping mall for a week and drive Chief Wiggam crazy, while Lisa enrolls in a tap dance school run by a former child star who is full of herself.

videos.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad Marge
videos.overview: Otto's girlfriend seems to be usurping Marge's role when she moves in with the family after a dispute over heavy metal.

videos.title: Behind the Laughter
videos.overview: A clip show like episode of behinds the scenes as if Simpsons were a real family doing unanimated tv.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror XI
videos.overview: In the 11th annual Halloween trilogy, a ghostly Homer tries to perform a good deed on Earth; Bart and Lisa are trapped in a fairy-tale forest; and dolphins revolt against humans after Lisa frees their king from the Springfield Marine Park.

videos.title: A Tale of Two Springfields
videos.overview: Homer gets frustrated because Springfield now has to area codes for phone calls and he divides the Town, becomes mayor of New Springfield. He then wages war against Olde Springfield and it is up to The Who to reunite the town.

videos.title: Insane Clown Poppy
videos.overview: While Krusty is signing autographs, Bart meets a girl who turns out to be Krusty's daughter. Krusty then spends a day at the beach with her and later that night he gambles away his daughter Sophie's violin. He then recruits Homer to help him get it back from Fat Tony and the Mob. Blackboard 'I will not surprise the incontinent'.

videos.title: Lisa the Treehugger
videos.overview: Joshua Jackson plays a committed---and cute---teen environmentalist who inspires Lisa to take up residence in a redwood tree to save it from destruction. Blackboard 'I am not the acting President'.

videos.title: Homer vs. Dignity
videos.overview: With Smithers away, Burns hires a cash-hungry Homer as his "prank monkey" to perform stunts that ultimately damage Homer's dignity. Leeza Gibbons has a cameo. Blackboard 'I was not the sixth Beattle'.

videos.title: The Computer Wore Menace Shoes
videos.overview: After having to go to work because he did not get the email about the day off, Homer buys a computer and starts a tell all web page. He then wins a award for the web site. Blackboard 'I will only provide a urine sample when asked'.

videos.title: The Great Money Caper
videos.overview: Homer and Bart turn into a couple of con artists in order to pay for a really high car repair bill. Blackboard 'The nurse is not dealing'.

videos.title: Skinner's Sense of Snow
videos.overview: A blizzard traps Skinner and Groundskeeper Willie with an assortment of students at Springfield Elementary. Bart (of course) leads the revolt.

videos.title: HOMR
videos.overview: Researchers find and fix the cause of Homer's "subnormal" intelligence, but Homer finds life as a brain is a drain on his popularity. Blackboard 'Network TV is not dead'.

videos.title: Pokey Mom
videos.overview: Homer hurts his back at a prison rodeo, where Marge meets an artistic inmate whom she takes under her wing. Blackboard 'I will not "Let The Dogs Out!"''

videos.title: Worst Episode Ever
videos.overview: Bart and Milhouse are at the Android Dungeon and end up being banned from the store for a lifetime. After Comic Book Guy has a heart attack, Bart and Milhouse take over running the store for him. Once Comic Book Guy recovers, he starts dating Principle Skinners mother. Blackboard 'I will not hide the teacher's medication'.

videos.title: Tennis the Menace
videos.overview: The Simpsons win points for their new tennis court, but constantly lose on Homer's poor play. Blackboard 'I will not publish the principal's credit report'.

videos.title: Day of the Jackanapes
videos.overview: Sideshow Bob talks his way out of prison and into a job at the school. There, he hypnotizes Bart---to make him kill Krusty, who plans a final show after growing sick of network interference. Blackboard 'The hamster did not have "A Full Life"'.

videos.title: New Kids on the Blecch
videos.overview: After Bart pulls a stunt during the Springfield Marathon, Lt. Smash boy-band creator recruits Bart, Nelson, Milhouse and Ralph to create a boy band. NSYNC visit's Springfield. Blackboard 'I will not buy a presidential pardon'.

videos.title: Hungry Hungry Homer
videos.overview: The family goes to Blocko land, Homer stands up to a guy for Lisa. Homer then proceeds to go on a hunger strike protesting a decision the Springfield Isotopes baseball teams owner is in the process of making.

videos.title: Bye Bye Nerdy
videos.overview: A new girl joins the elementary class and Lisa tries to figure out why she is bullying everyone. Homer goes on a mission to baby proof Springfield. Blackboard: 'I will not scare the vice president'.

videos.title: Simpsons Safari
videos.overview: Hungry Homer rips into a 30 year old box of animal crackers and finds a winning ticket for a trip to Africa. He then demands his prize. Blackboard: 'I will not flush evidence'.

videos.title: Trilogy of Error
videos.overview: Homer's severed thumb, Lisa's science project and Bart's discovery of fireworks prompt separate but simultaneous adventures that conclude with an encounter with mobster Fat Tony. Blackboard: 'Fire is not the cleanser'.

videos.title: I'm Goin' to Praise Land
videos.overview: With Homer's help, Ned Flanders tries to establish a Christian theme park based on drawings in his deceased wife's sketch book. Blackboard: 'Genetics is not an excuse'.

videos.title: Children of a Lesser Clod
videos.overview: Homer opens a day-care center in the house, prompting envy in Lisa and Bart when he treats other kids better than he treats them. Blackboard 'Today is not Mothra's day'.

videos.title: Simpsons Tall Tales
videos.overview: Folk-tale parodies abound, with Homer as Paul Bunyan; Lisa as Connie Appleseed; and Bart as Tom Sawyer, helping to save Huck Finn from a shotgun marriage to Becky Thatcher. Blackboard: 'I should not be twenty-one by now'.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror XII
videos.overview: "Treehouse of Horror XII" includes Pierce Brosnan as the voice of a computerized house that falls for Marge; a Gypsy's curse bringing bad luck to Homer's loved ones; and Bart and Lisa as competing wizards, with Bart enlisting help from a dark source.

videos.title: The Parent Rap
videos.overview: Bart is tethered to Homer as punishment for stealing a police cruiser. Blackboard 'Nobody reads these anymore!'.

videos.title: Homer the Moe
videos.overview: Moe gets more depressed than usual and renovates his tavern. He then kicks the old gang out and Homer opens a bar in his garage so the gang can have a place to hang out and fit in.

videos.title: Hunka Hunka Burns in Love
videos.overview: Homer is hired to write fortunes for fortune cookies, one of them changes Mr. Burn's life. Homer helps Mr. Burns with his dating. Blackboard: 'Fun does not have a size'.

videos.title: The Blunder Years
videos.overview: Marge becomes obsessed with a brand of paper towels and Homer pulls a gag on her. To make up for it, Homer takes her out, gets hypnotized and regresses to a childhood fear and starts screaming and does not stop until the source of the fear is drawn out of him. Blackboard 'I am not Charlie Brown on acid'.

videos.title: She of Little Faith
videos.overview: In this Christmas episode, Richard Gere offers Buddhist teachings to Lisa after she leaves her church because of Mr. Burns' tacky fund-raising efforts, which include commercials (during sermons) and podium-placed ads. Blackboard: 'I do not have a cereal named after me'.

videos.title: Brawl in the Family
videos.overview: Grampa comes to Homer's rescue after Ned and His Vegas wives show up at the house.

videos.title: Sweets and Sour Marge
videos.overview: Ben Stiller plays a sugar company's CEO who draws Marge's ire after Springfield is declared the "World's Fattest Town."

videos.title: Jaws Wired Shut
videos.overview: When Homer accidentally breaks his jaw, he has to have it wired shut and can not talk. He learns to become the good listener that Marge has wanted.

videos.title: Half-Decent Proposal
videos.overview: Now fabulously wealthy, Marge's grabby prom date Artie Ziff offers a million dollars for a weekend with her that, he says, will have "no funny stuff." The Simpsons agree when they realize the money will help their marriage---by paying for an operation that will cure Homer's snoring.

videos.title: The Bart Wants What It Wants
videos.overview: Bart ends up becoming close friends with Greta Wolfecastle after a fun fair and he has a blind eye to her feelings about him. Blackboard: 'The giving tree is not a chump'.

videos.title: The Lastest Gun in the West
videos.overview: Bart and Lisa try to help an old cowboy actor, who yearns to reclaim his past fame by getting him booked on the Krusty the Clown show.

videos.title: The Old Man and the Key
videos.overview: Grampa Simpson regains his driver's license to woo a new woman but is goaded into a race by senior punks.

videos.title: Tales from the Public Domain
videos.overview: Homer discovers a library book he checked out when Bart was born and Lisa suggests that he read aloud from it. Blackboard: 'Vampire is not a career choice'.

videos.title: Blame It on Lisa
videos.overview: Homer refuses to pay a really high phone bill then their service is shut off. The family travels to Rio De Janeiro to see Lisa's sponsored orphan.

videos.title: Weekend at Burnsies
videos.overview: Homer uses medicinal marijuana to relieve pain from eye injuries he suffered when attacked by crows.

videos.title: Gump Roast
videos.overview: The Springfield Friars Club roasts Homer, with emcee Krusty the Clown introducing friends, family and their memories from past episodes.

videos.title: I Am Furious Yellow
videos.overview: Encouraged by comic-book guru Stan Lee (in a cameo), Bart creates a strip about Homer that gets onto the Internet.

videos.title: The Sweetest Apu
videos.overview: Homer accidentally walks in on Apu when he is cheating on his wife at the Kwiki Mart.

videos.title: Little Girl in the Big Ten
videos.overview: Lisa becomes friends with college girls who are unaware of her age. Bart is bitten by a Chinese mosquito and must live in a bubble. Bart and Lisa also share a special moment.

videos.title: Frying Game
videos.overview: Homer's community service for threatening an endangered species involves helping a kindly senior, who meets an untimely death.

videos.title: Papa's Got a Brand New Badge
videos.overview: Homer starts a security company that ultimately replaces the cops---and runs afoul of mobster Fat Tony

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror XIII
videos.overview: "Treehouse of Horror XIII" finds Homer cloned; Dr. Hibbert turning the family into half animals; and Springfield invaded by zombie cowboys.

videos.title: How I Spent My Strummer Vacation
videos.overview: Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Tom Petty, Elvis Costello, Lenny Kravitz and Brian Setzer are the teachers when Homer attends a rock-and-roll fantasy camp.

videos.title: Bart vs. Lisa vs. 3rd Grade
videos.overview: After testing, Lisa is moved up a grade and Bart is held back so they are both in the 3rd grade together. The teacher thinks Bart is the smarter of the two since he already knows everything. They go on a field trip to Capital City and get left behind and lost. Blackboard 'Fish do not like Coffee'.

videos.title: Large Marge
videos.overview: Marge gets breast implants meant for Mayor Quimby's young girlfriend; Bart and Milhouse spot Krusty the Clown on a old episode of Batman.

videos.title: Helter Shelter
videos.overview: The Simpsons end up with termites after going to a hockey game and have to stay out of their house for 6 months. They end up on a reality series where they live in a 1880's type house and life style. Blackboard: 'Milhouse did not test cootie positive'.

videos.title: The Great Louse Detective
videos.overview: Someone's trying to kill Homer, so Chief Wiggum consults an expert: Sideshow Bob, who moves in with the Simpsons to shadow Homer.

videos.title: Special Edna (a.k.a. Love and Marking)
videos.overview: Bart feels sorry for Mrs. Krabappel after she is stood up by Principle Skinner, so he nominates her for an award.

videos.title: The Dad Who Knew Too Little
videos.overview: Homer feels bad because he does not know much about Lisa so he hires a private detective to spy on her. He then becomes a big hit with her because of the information.

videos.title: The Strong Arms of the Ma
videos.overview: After she is mugged, Marge retreats to the basement to lift weights. She then becomes obsessed with body building. Marge starts entering contests and her disposition changes as she gets stronger. Blackboard reads 'This school does not need a "regime change"'.

videos.title: Pray Anything
videos.overview: Jealous of Ned Flanders winning money at a sports event, Homer starts praying to God for good things to happen then develops a hedonistic lifestyle. Blackboard reads 'Spongebob is not a contraceptive'.

videos.title: Barting Over
videos.overview: While doing spring cleaning, Lisa comes across a video cassette of a add Bart did as baby "Stink Breath". Bart gets so mad about Homer having spent his earnings from the add that he asks the court to emancipate him from the family. Blackboard reads 'I will not'.

videos.title: I'm Spelling As Fast As I Can
videos.overview: Spelling champ Lisa makes the Spellympics, where host George Plimpton proposes a deal; Homer joins a traveling fan club for a new Krusty food product.

videos.title: A Star is Born Again
videos.overview: Ned becomes lonely when all the Springfield family's spend a day at the beach with their significant others and ends up dating an actor.

videos.title: Mr. Spritz Goes to Washington
videos.overview: Hoping to reroute air traffic over their house, the Simpsons ask Krusty to run for Congress, where the successful clown finds more of his kind.

videos.title: C. E. D'oh
videos.overview: Homer's stint in a success workshop gives him new initiative, but Mr. Burns' lack of appreciation prompts Homer to plot revenge, which results in a takeover of the power plant.

videos.title: 'Scuse Me While I Miss the Sky
videos.overview: Lisa searches for a steady career after a British filmmaker makes her feel inadequate and decides on astronomy.

videos.title: Three Gays of the Condo
videos.overview: While looking for a puzzle piece, Homer comes across a letter Marge wrote about how upset she was with Homer right before they were married. He thinks she married him because she became pregnant with Bart and moves out.

videos.title: Dude, Where's My Ranch?
videos.overview: Musician David Byrne offers to produce the song that Homer wrote about how much he dislikes his neighbor Ned Flanders. The Simpsons then go to a Dude Ranch where Lisa meets a special boy.

videos.title: Old Yeller-Belly
videos.overview: When Homer is trapped, the dog ignores him and he is saved by the cat. Homer then says he has no dog. H.K. Duff, owner of Duff beer makes the Simpsons dog, Santa's Little Helper the Duff mascot. Blackboard reads 'my pen is not a booger launcher'.

videos.title: Brake My Wife, Please
videos.overview: Homer has his drivers license revoked by Judge Harm which forces Marge to do all the driving for the family.

videos.title: The Bart of War
videos.overview: Busted for a prank gone awry, Milhouse and Bart are enrolled in different youth groups that become heated rivals. Blackboard reads 'sandwiches should not contain sand'.

videos.title: Moe Baby Blues
videos.overview: Homer and Marge permit Moe to baby sit Maggie and she takes a shine to Moe, which causes Homer to become jealous.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror XIV
videos.overview: A Halloween trilogy (XIV), with Jennifer Garner, Oscar De La Hoya and Jerry Lewis as Professor Frink's father, who goes on a rampage after being brought back from the dead. Homer kills death in the first tale and has to become the grim reaper; In the Second tale Professor Frink wins a Nobel prize and then brings his father back from the dead in a Frankenstein parody; in the 3rd tale Bart gets access to a watch that changes the fabric of existence and along with Milhouse they cause trouble in Springfield.

videos.title: My Mother the Carjacker
videos.overview: Surfacing to see her son, Homer's fugitive mom is caught and tried for sabotaging a lab owned by Mr. Burns, who's loath to let a grudge die.

videos.title: The President Wore Pearls
videos.overview: Lisa is made to look like Eva Peron in this loose parody as faculty members undermine her student-body presidency.

videos.title: The Regina Monologues
videos.overview: Prime Minister Tony Blair welcomes the Simpsons to England, where they run into author J.K. Rowling and actor Ian McKellan.

videos.title: The Fat and the Furriest
videos.overview: Homer goes on a mission of revenge against a bear that attacked him during a visit to the dump and creates a home made bear-fighting suit. Blackboard 'My pen is not a booger launcher'.

videos.title: Today I Am a Klown
videos.overview: Krusty's rabbi father helps him prepare for his bar mitzvah, which includes Mr. T; Homer guest hosts for Krusty and is a hit. Dan Castellaneta, Blackboard reads 'over forty & single is not funny'.

videos.title: 'Tis the Fifteenth Season
videos.overview: A version of "A Christmas Carol" causes Homer to go from greedy to giving, prompting jealousy in Flanders, who gives gifts to everyone in town.

videos.title: Marge vs. Singles, Seniors, Childless Couples and Teens, and Gays
videos.overview: Maggie is among the babies who riot at a kiddie concert, prompting a backlash by single childless citizens, who organize against kids and families.

videos.title: I, (Annoyed Grunt)-Bot
videos.overview: Unable to build Bart a working robot for TV's "Robot Rumble," Homer becomes the robot by hiding inside, taking beatings, but giving better.

videos.title: Diatribe of a Mad Housewife
videos.overview: Tom Clancy, Thomas Pynchon and the Olsen twins have cameos as Marge writes a novel that casts Homer in a bad light, and Flanders in a good one.

videos.title: Margical History Tour
videos.overview: Marge talks history, with Homer as Henry VIII, Lenny and Carl as Lewis and Clark, Lisa as an opinionated Sacagawea and Bart as Mozart.

videos.title: Milhouse Doesn't Live Here Anymore
videos.overview: Bart bonds with Lisa after Milhouse and his mom move to Capital City; Homer panhandles to buy Marge's anniversary gift.

videos.title: Smart & Smarter
videos.overview: Simon Cowell plays an admissions interviewer at a prestigious pre-nursery school where Maggie's IQ is found to surpass Lisa's, causing an identity crisis for the older sister.

videos.title: The Ziff Who Came to Dinner
videos.overview: Lisa finds Arte Ziff living in their attic after seeing a horror movie with Homer and Bart. Artie moves in because he owes massive amounts of money to his company shareholders. Blackboard reads 'I will not speculate on how hot teacher used to be'.

videos.title: Co-Dependent's Day
videos.overview: After a winery tour, Marge and Homer become drinking pals, until a driving mishap prompts one to pull a fast one on the other.

videos.title: Wandering Juvie
videos.overview: Sarah Michelle Gellar plays a delinquent whom Bart meets in a juvenile-correction facility that's not strong enough to hold them.

videos.title: My Big Fat Geek Wedding
videos.overview: Skinner's cold feet near the altar also give Edna second thoughts, leading her into a rebound romance.

videos.title: Catch 'Em If You Can
videos.overview: Grandpa, Bart and Lisa Simpson take off on a cross country journey when Homer and Marge just want to spend a bit of kid free time.

videos.title: Simple Simpson
videos.overview: Avenging a slight to Lisa turns Homer into the city's new crusader for justice, a masked man whose weapon of choice is a pie in the face.

videos.title: The Way We Weren't
videos.overview: After Bart and Milhouse play a game of Spin the Bottle in the tree house, Homer tells the story of his and Marge's first kiss. Marge and Homer then learn they were destined to be together.

videos.title: Bart-Mangled Banner
videos.overview: Marge and Homer work hard to get Bart to the doctor for a shot, he then goes deaf as a side effect. Later he is bending over doing a full moon and accidentally moons the American Flag and the Dante basket ball classic during the national anthem.

videos.title: Fraudcast News
videos.overview: Mr. Burns buys all the media outlets in town after everyone thinks he is dead and does not care. Lisa starts her own newspaper and ends up in a war with Burns.

videos.title: Treehouse of Horror XV
videos.overview: Hands out its annual Halloween treats on the "Treehouse of Horror XV" special featuring three deliciously frightful mini-episodes. In "The Ned Zone," Ned Flanders gains the power of foretelling people's deaths after suffering a head injury, and is shocked to discover that he will be the one to kill Homer. In the second short, "In the Belly of the Boss," Maggie is shrunken inside a vitamin capsule in a freak science accident and is swallowed by Mr. Burns. The final Halloween scare, "Four Beheadings and a Funeral," is set in Victorian London, where Master Detective Eliza Simpson and her faithful sidekick, Dr. Bartley, attempt to catch The Muttonchop Murderer, a Jack the Ripper-esque serial killer.

videos.title: All's Fair in Oven War
videos.overview: When Bart fishes Homer's vintage "Playdude" magazines out of the trash, he decides to adopt the ring-a-ding-ding lifestyle of the 1970s, as interpreted by a 10-year-old. Looking for some action, actor James Caan, guest-starring as himself, drops by Bart's swinging Playdude treehouse. Meanwhile, Marge stoops to sabotage to keep up with the other contestants during the Ovenfresh Bakeoff, attended by the likes of.

videos.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
videos.overview: Feeling unappreciated by her own children, Marge takes in neglected son and Springfield Elementary School bully Nelson Muntz. Horrified his tormentor is now living under the same roof, Bart goes on a mission to find Nelson's parents and reunite the Muntzes.

videos.title: She Used to Be My Girl
videos.overview: Marge runs into her former high school pal Chloe Talbot, who is now a famous newscaster. Chloe is cultured, sharp-dressed and has a successful career on television. While Lisa has become enamored with Chloe's worldliness, Marge becomes jealous and wonders if she made the right decision by choosing family over a career. Blackboard 'Poking a dead raccoon is not research'.

videos.title: Fat Man and Little Boy
videos.overview: When Bart writes slogans on t-shirts, he catches the attention of Goose Gladwell, a gag gift entrepreneur, and soon becomes a t-shirt mogul. With Bart now the breadwinner, Homer feels he no longer has a place in the family. In order to feel more useful, Homer begins spending more time with Lisa, including watching documentaries by scholar Declan Desmond. But when Gladwell is revealed as a fraud, Homer steps in to show him who's really boss. Blackboard 'My pen is not a booger launcher'.

videos.title: Midnight Rx
videos.overview: When Mr. Burns terminates the employee prescription drug program, the citizens of Springfield are no longer able to afford their very expensive but much-needed prescription drugs. In order to keep the town medicated, Homer, Grampa, Apu and Flanders travel to Canada to buy the drugs with fake Canadian health care cards. When they are caught smuggling the goods, all of Springfield rallies around them to fight for their freedom.

videos.title: Mommie Beerest
videos.overview: When Moe's Tavern is shut down by the health department, Homer refinances the house to save the bar. Infuriated by this, Marge decides to protect her investment and takes an active, hands-on role as Moe's partner. Marge gives the bar a facelift and boosts the clientele, while Homer has to stay home and play Mr. Mom. Meanwhile, Moe begins to develop deep feelings for his new partner.

videos.title: Homer and Ned's Hail Mary Pass
videos.overview: In THE SIMPSONS post-Super Bowl XXXIX episode, "Homer and Ned's Hail Mary Pass," after Homer inadvertently performs a wild crowd-pleasing dance at a local carnival, he is hired by several prolific sports figures - including Tom Brady, LeBron James, Warren Sapp, Yao Ming and Michelle Kwan, guest-starring as themselves - to choreograph their victory dances. After his dances prove successful, Homer is tapped to choreograph the Super Bowl halftime show. Panicked the night before the event, Homer enlists the help of his neighbor, Ned Flanders, and together they put on a nonviolent, deeply meaningful half-time show that America chastises for its blatant display of decency.

videos.title: Pranksta Rap
videos.overview: After sneaking out of the house to attend a 50 Cent concert and getting nabbed by Marge and Homer, Bart fakes his own kidnapping, hiding out in Kirk Van Houten's bachelor pad, to prevent being grounded. It is up to Springfield's finest - bumbling Police Chief Clancy Wiggum - to save him. Inspired by an apparition of Barney Fife, Wiggum cracks the case, rescues Bart and is promoted to Police Commissioner, while wrongly-imprisoned Kirk becomes a lady's man among the felon-loving singles of Springfield.

videos.title: There's Something About Marrying
videos.overview: One of Springfield's own comes out of the closet. To boost tourism, the town of Springfield decides to legalize same-sex marriage. Homer discovers the monetary value of gay union, becomes an ordained minister via the Internet and soon marries everyone and everything in town - including a surprising someone very close to him.

videos.title: On a Clear Day I Can't See My Sister
videos.overview: Fed up with Bart's endless taunting and torture, Lisa enlists the help of Chief Wiggum and files a restraining order against him. After watching a restraining order video hosted by guest voice Gary Busey, Bart learns he must stay 20 feet away from his sister. When he tries to contest it, Judge Harm increases it to 200 feet, forcing Bart to live in the back yard. Meanwhile, Homer takes over Grampa's job as a greeter at the Sprawl Mart.

videos.title: Goo Goo Gai Pan
videos.overview: After watching a video on menopause, hosted by guest voice Robert Wagner, Selma realizes that she missed her chance to have a baby and decides to adopt a baby girl from China. Selma encounters a bump in the road when the application asks for her husband's name. In an act of desperation, she puts down "Homer Simpson." Soon, Selma and the Simpsons are off to China to pick up her baby girl, while Homer must pretend to be her husband. When their charade is finally revealed, the functionary, Madam Yu, takes Selma's baby back. Homer and the gang must devise a plan to rescue the baby from the orphanage.

videos.title: Mobile Homer
videos.overview: After Homer suffers a garage-door-to-the-throat incident, Marge is pressured into buying life insurance for the entire family. Much to her surprise, she finds out that Homer is uninsurable and resorts to cutting costs across the board in the household. Homer is convinced by his buddies that Marge is trying to make all financial decisions, so in an act of defiance, he buys an RV. This reckless act infuriates Marge, causing a divide between the two and ultimately forcing Homer to live in his new RV. Determined to save their feuding parents, Bart and Lisa steal the RV in hopes of returning it for a refund, but are instantly faced with obstacles.

videos.title: The Seven-Beer Snitch
videos.overview: To prove to Shelbyville that Springfield is not a hick town, Marge convinces the Springfield townspeople to fund a Frank Gehry- designed concert hall. Opening night turns disastrous after the sounds of Beethoven's Fifth Symphony drive the uninterested townspeople away, ultimately leading the hall to bankruptcy. Never one to miss an opportunity, Mr. Burns assumes the debt and turns the hall into the Montgomery Burns State Prison. Initially the prison proves to be a positive addition to the town, providing jobs to almost everyone except Homer, who is imprisoned after a lab test mix-up. Meanwhile at prison, Fat Tony puts a mark on Homer's head for being a snitch .

videos.title: Future-Drama
videos.overview: When Professor Frink uses an astrology machine to ease the constant bickering between Bart and Lisa, they are given a sneak-peek into their final days of high school. In this future view, Marge and Homer are separated, Lisa is dating a muscular Milhouse and Bart is dating the girl of his dreams, Jenda, guest-voiced by Amy Poehler. Much to their disappointment, both the relationships quickly flounder. In hopes of winning Jenda back, Bart takes a job at a Kwik-E-Mart, where he becomes the local hero after saving Mr. Burns from a robber. His reward is a scholarship to Yale that was initially intended for Lisa. Bart's deeper look into the future causes him to have a change of heart, ultimately affecting his present-day sibling rivalry for the better.

videos.title: Don't Fear the Roofer
videos.overview: In the milestone 350th episode, Homer befriends beer-loving barfly and roofer Ray Magini, guest-voiced by Ray Romano. After discovering a shared passion for sandwiches and the Three Stooges, Homer and Ray become inseparable friends. However, Marge believes Ray is a figment of Homer's imagination and enlists the help of Dr. Hibbert to literally "shock" Ray Magini out of Homer's system.

videos.title: The Heartbroke Kid
